trans-unit.source: Create Rich Messaging Endpoints on Azure
trans-unit.target: Create Rich Messaging Endpoints on Azure

trans-unit.source: The topic <link xlink:href="a920966f-2095-4579-9164-da742f7f3353" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rich Messaging Endpoints</link> discusses how such endpoints provide the ability to connect to disparate LOB applications and the ability to validate, transform, and extract properties from a message.
trans-unit.target: The topic <link xlink:href="a920966f-2095-4579-9164-da742f7f3353" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rich Messaging Endpoints</link> discusses how such endpoints provide the ability to connect to disparate LOB applications and the ability to validate, transform, and extract properties from a message.

trans-unit.source: The topic <link xlink:href="70201659-05a5-44e2-9245-58f9a67345c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Design Experience for Configuring Rich Messaging Endpoints</link> provides information on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design surface that can be used to configure such endpoints.
trans-unit.target: The topic <link xlink:href="70201659-05a5-44e2-9245-58f9a67345c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Design Experience for Configuring Rich Messaging Endpoints</link> provides information on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> design surface that can be used to configure such endpoints.

trans-unit.source: An end-to-end message processing entity may contain a message source (for receiving the message), message processing unit (such as a bridge), and finally a message destination (where the message is routed).
trans-unit.target: An end-to-end message processing entity may contain a message source (for receiving the message), message processing unit (such as a bridge), and finally a message destination (where the message is routed).

trans-unit.source: So, configuring a rich messaging endpoint might include configuring all three components.
trans-unit.target: So, configuring a rich messaging endpoint might include configuring all three components.

trans-unit.source: This section provides the procedural information on how to configure all these components using the <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: This section provides the procedural information on how to configure all these components using the <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: Even though <embeddedLabel>Transforms</embeddedLabel> are a part of rich messaging endpoints, they can either be configured as part of the <token>msgflow_proj</token> or created separately before they are added to the message flow.
trans-unit.target: Even though <embeddedLabel>Transforms</embeddedLabel> are a part of rich messaging endpoints, they can either be configured as part of the <token>msgflow_proj</token> or created separately before they are added to the message flow.
